CIVE 3331 ENVIRONMENTAL ENGINEERING
Spring 2005

Home page for CIVE 3331 Environmental Engineering. 

I use the following "convention" for date/time in most of my work:  YYYY_MMDD  
For example, the first meeting is January 19, 2005.  That would "code" as 2005_0119.

Homework due dates are in remarks section of schedule.  
If no due date is shown, it is due one week from the meeting date.
